title: for real doe help me

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
it didnt let me bad a champion  cause it was all invisible and it kicked me now i gotta wait 5 mins for new game plz
edit: it happened again after the five mins i just waited please rito

replies.body:
It appears your computer is falling out of sync with the matchmaking service, which is often caused by a fluctuating or poor connection to our servers. I'd recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local connection configuration is done up properly for League.

Let me know if this resolved your issue or not.
